Name: Rose Crescent
Ingredients: 10 ml Island single malt Scotch whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Ginger and cognac with underlying whisky and herbal complexity.
History: Created in 2015 by Sean Baylis at La Raza, Cambridge, England
Nutrition: One serving of Rose Crescent contains 158 calories
